sentences.simplifiedText: 说来说去，一句话，你就是不信任我。
sentences.traditionalText: 說來說去，一句話，你就是不信任我。
sentences.pinyin: Shuo lái shuo qù, yī jù huà, nǐ jiù shì bù xìn rèn wǒ.
sentences.translation: After all said and done, in a word, you just don't trust me.

sentences.simplifiedText: 经过日夜奋斗和努力，我们终于解决了这个问题，一句话，值得。
sentences.traditionalText: 經過日夜奮鬥和努力，我們終於解決了這個問題，一句話，值得。
sentences.pinyin: Jīngguò rìyè fèndòu hé nǔlì, wǒmen zhōngyú jiějuéle zhège wèntí, yī jù huà, zhídé.
sentences.translation: After days and nights of hard work and effort, we finally solved this problem. In a word, it was worth it.
